p: The methanolic extract of the aerial part of T. leptobotrys has a higher DPPH antioxidant activity than both the methanolic extract of the leaves of T. leptobotrys (IC50 = 1950 μg/mL) and the methanolic extract of the stems of T. leptobotrys (IC50 = 430 μg/mL) using the DPPH test [ 29]. Thus, the whole aerial part of the plant is logically more active than individual leaves or stems.
